videoSnippet.title: Sorcery! || Nepo vs MVL || MC Invitational (2020)
videoSnippet.description:
Support fishnet here https://lichess.org/get-fishnet

Follow me on Instagram for extra content and notifications https://www.instagram.com/agadmator/

Ian Nepomniachtchi vs Maxime Vachier Lagrave
Magnus Carlsen Invitational GAME 1, 21.4.2020
English, Caro-Kann defensive system (A11)

1. c4 c6 2. Nf3 d5 3. g3 Nf6 4. Bg2 dxc4 5. O-O Nbd7 6. Na3 Nb6 7. Qc2 Be6 8. Ng5 Bg4 9. Nxc4 Bxe2 10. Ne5 Bh5 11. Re1 h6 12. Ngxf7 Bxf7 13. b4 a6 14. a4 g5 15. Ba3 Bg7 16. Ng6 Bxg6 17. Qxg6+ Kf8 18. b5 Nbd5 19. bxc6 bxc6 20. Rab1 Qd7 21. Rb3 Kg8 22. Reb1 Qe8 23. Qd3 Rh7 24. Bb2 Bf8 25. Be5 Nd7 26. Bxd5+ cxd5 27. Qxd5+ e6 28. Qd4 Rf7 29. Bd6 Bxd6 30. Qxd6 Qe7 31. Qc6 Raf8 32. Re3 Rxf2 33. Rxe6 Qf7 34. Qe4 Nf6 35. Qc4 Rf3 36. Kg2 g4 37. Rbb6 Kh8 38. h3 Nh7 39. Qd4+ Qg7 40. Qxg7+ Kxg7 41. Re7+ Kh8 42. Re2 gxh3+ 43. Kxh3 R3f6 44. Rb7 Rg6 45. Ra7 Ng5+ 46. Kg2 Rgf6 47. d4 R8f7 48. Ra8+ Kg7 49. d5 Rd7 50. Rd2 Rfd6 51. g4 Ne4 52. Rc2 Nf6 53. Rc6 Rxd5 54. Raxa6 Rd2+ 55. Kg3 R7d3+ 56. Kf4 Rf2+ 57. Ke5 Re2+ 58. Kf4 Nd5+

World Champion Magnus Carlsen takes on world blitz no. 1 Hikaru Nakamura today in a 4-game rapid match as the $250,000 Magnus Carlsen Invitational begins. Usually that pairing would eclipse any other match, but 16-year-old Alireza Firouzja taking on world no. 3 Ding Liren is almost as mouth-watering. Can Alireza continue in the form that saw him beat Magnus in the Banter Blitz Cup final? All the games will be streamed live on chess24 with commentary in 9 languages as a new age of online chess begins.

https://chess24.com/en/read/news/the-magnus-carlsen-invitational-starts-today
